overview: Charles C. Matteson, Jr. is an entrepreneur with over 20 years experience in managing retail and franchised operations. He founded and became one of the largest franchisees for Nutri/System weight loss clinics. He owned and operated 21 centers with over $12 million in sales and 200 employees. He was elected to the franchiseeâ€™s Board and was President of the Advertising Cooperative. He was honored by the franchisees for operational excellence and was four times recognized in Ernst & Youngâ€™s/Inc. Magazineâ€™s â€œEntrepreneur of the Yearâ€ program. He founded Incontrol Systems LLC and led the development of a protocol, business plan, marketing program and franchising plan for retail-based healthcare company. He secured $1 million initial venture capital. Previously, Mr. Matteson held various positions in the sales and management in the computer and Real Estate industries He is a graduate of Pennsylvania State University with a B.S. in Marketing.
